spec.rawSql:
SELECT
    type,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY type
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
    client_ip,
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY client_ip, minute
ORDER BY minute, count DESC

spec.title: Count by Client IP Over Time

spec.rawSql:
SELECT
    count() as queries,
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY minute
ORDER BY minute DESC

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    countIf(rcode != 'NOERROR') / count() AS error_rate
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY minute
ORDER BY minute

SELECT
    count() AS count,
    IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 as subnet
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY  subnet
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    countIf(dnssec_ok = 0) / count() AS error_rate
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY minute
ORDER BY minute

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    count() AS count,
    type
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY type, minute
ORDER BY minute, count DESC

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    countIf(dnssec_ok = 0) / count() AS error_rate
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY minute
ORDER BY minute

SELECT
    *
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
ORDER BY Time ASC

SELECT
    quantile(0.9)(duration_secs) as p90,
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet}) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY minute
ORDER BY minute DESC

SELECT
    client_ip,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY client_ip
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
    rcode,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY rcode
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
    dnssec_ok,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY dnssec_ok
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
    name,
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY name, minute
ORDER BY minute, count DESC

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    count() AS count,
    IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 as subnet
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) 
  AND name IN (${name}) 
  AND rcode IN (${rcode}) 
  AND type IN (${type}) 
  AND $__timeFilter(Time) 
  AND client_ip IS NOT NULL
  AND IPv4CIDRToRange(assumeNotNull(client_ip), 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY subnet, minute
ORDER BY minute, count DESC

spec.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT
    IPv4CIDRToRange(ifNull(client_ip, toIPv4('0.0.0.0')), 24).1 as subnet
FROM dns_logs_mv
spec.name: subnet

spec.__legacyStringValue:
SELECT DISTINCT
    IPv4CIDRToRange(ifNull(client_ip, toIPv4('0.0.0.0')), 24).1 as subnet
FROM dns_logs_mv
